Text.Page: The naga sentries at Viper Strand are gathering intelligence on our troop movements and forewarning their inland brethren. Clear out {@LinkCreature:10#16#naga clawriders} so our troop movements remain unobserved. Report your success to Briale.

I'll bet the nagas turn tail and run when they see you coming.

Get it? "Turn tail?"

'Cause, y'see, the nagas have tails...
We can't win this war if the enemy knows our every move, <PCCLASS:lcase>.
